thread.section_title: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc | www.townfairtire.com | 12 of 1307
thread.title: Linda K
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Linda K

author: Linda K
title: Linda K
text:
I stopped on Tuesday to have a tire plugged. The customer service/front desk representative explained what type of puncture could be repaired and the cost. Unfortunately, due to my time restraint, I didn't have the time to wait my turn (5th in line) and said I would return Wednesday afternoon.
I did return Wednesday to have the tire checked, the 2 service reps were quite pleasant and professional.
